page.title: 17LITCHARD JUNIOR SCH.BRIDGEND
page.content: Litchard Primary School opened in February 1953,but in February 1969 it split into infant and junior schools, taking children from four to six and seven to eleven years of age.The infants has 206 children and the juniors 275. Ten years ago the Nature reserve was started and completed in 1980,when it won a Prince of Wales award. In 1983 the School won one of the first ever Schools'Curriculum Awards. Thus becoming the only school in Mid-Glamorgan to gain one. The children study subjects including Maths,English,Welsh,Art,History,R.E., Geography,Science,Environmental Studies,Health,P.E.,Games and Folk Dancing.Swimming is also on the Time Table,for the school has its own swimming pool,due to the efforts of its very active P.T.A.
